page.title: 04Recreation in West Farnham
page.content: There are not many recreational facilities in the area we are studying. The following recreational facilities are within this D-Block: {Wrecclesham Recreation Ground}in which many club activities like rugby, football,cricket and tennis take place. {The Memorial Ground}is similar with football clubs but no cricket clubs.There are also many open spaces with facilities for the younger generation:such as swings and slides. {FARNHAM RUGBY CLUB The Rugby Club meet at Wrecclesham Recreation Ground in Westfield Lane. About 200 children and 80 adults play rugby every weekend.Another 50 adults are regular social members.The clubs badge is a Bishops Mitre,because the founding members were regulars at the Mitre pub in Farnham.
